content.author: vitalikbuterin
content.content:
Check out the deep funding round here!

cryptopond.xyz/modelfactory/…

summary: Vitalik Buterin, the co-founder of Ethereum, shared a tweet promoting a "deep funding round" related to a project or initiative hosted on the website cryptopond.xyz. The tweet encourages followers to explore the details of this funding round, suggesting it might be of interest to those involved in or following developments in the crypto and blockchain space. The tweet was posted on February 28, 2023.
